basic_pass.description: If BasicUser is set then this should be the password for the BasicUser.

basic_user.description: A Basic Auth User account to use to login

branding.description: Set to 0 to use branding (default) or 1 to disable public reporting branding).

check_rate.description: Test check rate in seconds. Defaults to 300

confirmations.description: The number of confirmation servers to use in order to detect downtime. Defaults to 0.

contact_id.description: The id of the contact group to be add to the test.  Each test can have only one.

custom_header.description: Custom HTTP header, must be supplied as JSON.

do_not_find.description: If the above string should be found to trigger a alert. 1 = will trigger if find_string found.

final_endpoint.description: Use to specify the expected Final URL in the testing process.

find_string.description: A string that should either be found or not found.

follow_redirect.description: Use to specify whether redirects should be followed, set to true to enable. Default is false.

logo_image.description: A URL to a image to use for public reporting.

node_locations.description: Set test node locations, must be array of strings.

paused.description: Whether or not the test is paused. Defaults to false.

ping_url.description: A URL to ping if a site goes down.

port.description: The port to use when specifying a TCP test.

post_raw.description: Use to populate the RAW POST data field on the test.

public.description: Set 1 to enable public reporting, 0 to disable.

real_browser.description: Use 1 to TURN OFF real browser testing.

test_tags.description: Tags should be seperated by a comma - no spacing between tags (this,is,a set,of,tags).

test_type.description: The type of Test. Either HTTP, TCP, PING, or DNS

timeout.description: The timeout of the test in seconds.

trigger_rate.description: The number of minutes to wait before sending an alert. Default is 5.

use_jar.description: Set to true to enable the Cookie Jar. Required for some redirects. Default is false.

user_agent.description: Test with a custom user agent set.

virus.description: Enable virus checking or not. 1 to enable

website_host.description: Used internally, when possible please add.

website_name.description: This is the name of the test and the website to be monitored.

website_url.description: The URL of the website to be monitored
